name: Netherhot Furnace
pages: The Netherhot furnace is 25x more faster than the vanilla furnace, below is the recipe for it. This furnace can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/platinum_furnace)platinum/$ or $(l:patchouli:furnaces/diamond_furnace)diamond furnace/$ to craft. Additionally it requires one or two $(l:patchouli:items/netherhot_conductor_block)netherhot conductor block/$ in its recipe.
